tool_description: This API is the ultimate tool for creating eye-catching and engaging Image captions. With its advanced machine learning algorithms, This API is able to analyze the content of a photo and generate a list of caption suggestions that are relevant and attention-grabbing. Whether you're looking for a funny, heartfelt, or thought-provoking caption, It has you covered.
name: Photo Caption Generator
title: Photo Caption Generator

api_list.name: Get Labels
api_list.description: This API will generate a list of labels describing the content of the image. Then use this labels to pass it into GetCaption API
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://photo-caption-generator.p.rapidapi.com/analyseImage"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "photo-caption-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Generate Caption
api_list.description: Pass in labels and/or descriptions to generate captions for an image
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://photo-caption-generator.p.rapidapi.com/generateCaption"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "photo-caption-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
